entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High 10.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few showers. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few showers beginning early in the morning and ending near noon. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 30 km/h then light late in the morning. High plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
